turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi. how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello Google, I need to order two pies.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello. where do u want pie from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Google, I want pie from Bella Luna Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: oh, did u mean pizza pies? or those sweet dessert pies?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And that pizza pie is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. let's get the order started. what did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want two large pizzas, Google. I want one meat lover's, I want one with pineapple, sausage, and tomato, and bell pepper.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: and onion.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: for the one with tomatoes, did u want sun dried tomatoes, or regular tomatoes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Which would you recommend?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: well. i personally wouldn't put pineapple on my pizza. but i'd recommend sun dried tomatoes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sun dried tomatoes, Google. I want sun dried tomatoes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sun dried tomatoes it is. so the order i have down is 2 large pizzas, 1 meat lovers, and 1 with pineapple, sausage, sun dried tomatoes, bell peppers and onions.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, Google. But Google, I need them both thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, i've added thick crust to your order. $25.04 is the total.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. It's for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order. it'll b ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did u need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it today, Google.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, enjoy those pizzas.
